item.title: Summer of Covid & how we beat it
item.description: Texas is known for 2 things - the bbq and Texas summer heat.

item.title: You need to start somewhere
item.description: I have always wanted to write a blog but never actually found the time or energy to do this. It feels great to finally be able to carve out some time and publish my view on different topics I care about. Again these are just my opinions and not meant to harm anyone. I came to the United States as a student pursuing my Masters ðŸŽ“ in August 2006. I can’t believe that it’s been 14 years now.
